header_text: You're at a dinner party with your dearest friends. You get a plate for food and on your way over to the dining table, you drop your plate on the floor. Two of your friends start running over to help you, but they look concerned.

elements.text: They share that they've done something similar in the past and don't want you to feel bad about it. This offers you some...
